ai:cl.c: Extends the Vector class with support for spiral path generation.

ai:f.c: The horizontal center of the spiral. Expressed as a fixed or scaled coordinate.
The vertical center of the spiral. Expressed as a fixed or scaled coordinate.
The height (vertical diameter) of the spiral.
Used to limit the number of loops produced by the spiral path generator.
Offset the starting coordinate of the spiral by this value.
Calibrates the user agent's distance-along-a-path calculations with that of the author.
The radius of the spiral. Expressed as a fixed or scaled coordinate.
Declares the amount of empty space between each loop of the spiral.
Determines the distance between each vertex in the spiral's path.
The width (horizontal diameter) of the spiral.
